question: Which Indian city is to organize the 58th Indian Society of Aerospace Medicine (ISAM) Annual Conference?
explanation: The 58th Indian Society of Aerospace Medicine (ISAM) Annual Conference has been scheduled to be held on 14-16 November 2019 at the Institute of Aerospace Medicine, Indian Air Force, Bengaluru. The aim of the ISAM Conference is to address contemporary issues and applications in the subject of aerospace medicine.
